description: Explosive revelations in a 500-page Federal Police report allege ties between federal state civil police chief Rivaldo Barbosa and organized crime in the killing of Councilwoman Marielle Franco, a rising political star and Black LGBTQ woman.
title: A Brazilian rising political star's killing was a mystery until an explosive federal report

description: Protests against Benjamin Netanyahu’s government erupted in Jerusalem as the prime minister’s cabinet has faced widespread criticism over Oct. 7 Hamas attack on Israel. Clashes also occurred in the Mea Shearim neighborhood over ultra-Orthodox Jews being allowed exemption from military service.
title: Anti-government protests erupt across Jerusalem

description: Former Taiwanese President Ma Ying-jeou is visiting China to help build social and cultural links on a trip that might include a meeting with Chinese leader Xi Jinping despite heightened tensions.
title: Ex-Taiwanese President Ma visits China to help build social and cultural links

description: Japan's royal family joined social media on Monday, launching an Instagram account in a bid to appeal to the country's youth with photos of Emperor Naruhito and family.
title: The world's oldest royal family joins the social media frenzy, hoping to win young fans

description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, who is recovering from a hernia operation, is facing mounting political troubles as protesters call for early elections and a cease-fire deal to free the remaining hostages. Meanwhile, Israeli troops have withdrawn from al-Shifa hospital after a 2-week raid where the World Health Organization says 21 patients died during the siege. NBC’s Raf Sanchez reports for TODAY.
title: Netanyahu protesters in Israel call for early elections, cease-fire

description: Wide-scale destruction was seen at Gaza's Al-Shifa Hospital in Gaza City following the withdrawal of Israeli forces after a two-week operation during which they killed Palestinian gunmen and seized weaponry and intelligence documents.
title: Video shows the scale of destruction at Gaza’s Al-Shifa Hospital after Israeli withdrawal

description: Turks dealt President Reccep Tayyip Erdogan and his party their biggest electoral blow on Sunday in a nationwide local vote that reasserted the opposition as a political force and reinforced Istanbul Mayor Ekrem Imamoglu as the president’s chief rival.
title: Turkey’s resurgent opposition thumps Erdogan in pivotal local elections

description: Video shot by NBC News showed dozens of Palestinian Christians gathered at the Holy Family Church in Gaza City to celebrate Easter Sunday amid the ongoing Israel-Hamas war. The church has become a sanctuary for displaced Gazans.
title: Palestinian Christians attend Easter Mass in Gaza City

description: Israeli forces withdraw from Gaza's main hospital; Netanyahu faces mass protests
title: Israeli forces withdraw from Gaza's main hospital; Netanyahu faces mass protests
